XenotypeDef.label: baseline dova
XenotypeDef.description: The Dova. Originating from their Dovian homeworld and a cruel, harsh society which has left its impact even on those on the Rim. Whether sent here as punishment, or as escape and a search for better things, these Dova are here now.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: a baseline dova, from their harsh Dovian Homeworld, left for punishment, escape or a better life.
